testcase.classname: users could register with new account
testcase.name: user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user goto register page...............................................passed When user select gender type................................................passed Then user enter first name "automation" and last name "tester"..............passed Then user enter date of birth...............................................passed Then user enter email "test1@example.com" field.............................passed Then user fills Password fields "P@ssw0rd" "P@ssw0rd".......................passed Then user clicks on register button.........................................passed And applied Soft assertion as required for all scenarios....................passed

testcase.classname: users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with valid "test1@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"..............passed Then user press on login button.............................................passed And user login to the system successfully...................................passed

testcase.classname: users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with invalid "wrong@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd".............passed Then user press on login button.............................................passed And user could not login to the system......................................passed
